long_description: With an old-school military look and feel, the Vestal Alpha Bravo Canvas watch exudes cool simplicity and style. Its precise movement and glowing markers ensure accurate time-teeping, day or night. Thin, light stainless-steel case and a curved mineral crystal stand up to backyard abuse or the hard knocks of far-flung travel. Easy-to-read face features a classic, 3-hand analog dial with luminescent hands and markings. Nylon canvas strap offers durability and breathable comfort. The Vestal Alpha Bravo Canvas watch is water-resistant to 50m (165 ft.).
short_description: With an old-school military look and feel, the Vestal Alpha Bravo Canvas watch exudes cool simplicity and style. Its precise movement and glowing markers ensure accurate time-teeping, day or night.
